body_html:
@guillaume-michel Any way to do this for a tensor which has a batch of images?
Eg.
Tensor inputImg(DT_FLOAT, TensorShape({4,inputHeight,inputWidth,3}));

Since tensors aren't subscriptable, I'd imagine you would create tensors for each image, load the cv::Mat into it, and combine them somehow to forrn inputImg. If so, is there a way to combine tensors?
body:
@guillaume-michel Any way to do this for a tensor which has a batch of images? 
Eg.
`Tensor inputImg(DT_FLOAT, TensorShape({4,inputHeight,inputWidth,3}));`

Since tensors aren't subscriptable, I'd imagine you would create tensors for each image, load the `cv::Mat` into it, and combine them somehow to forrn `inputImg`. If so, is there a way to combine tensors?
